OOC: let me rewrite that alien contact thing, it could have been better.

    Tarantulas pours over the journal of the Alien Commander. From what he 
peiced together, this was a colonization post. It was put here to observe the 
planets evolution, and then with the data they would begin to relocate on to 
the planet. As he read further he found out that when the original Beast Wars 
took place, the Aliens began to observe the bots as a threat. They hadnt 
encountered any intelligent life before and this scared them. They knew the 
Maximals were trying to stop Megatron from destroying the Autobots, but felt 
both races needed to be exterminated.
    The Aliens constructed a ship called the Armada. It was an automated 
warship that would activate when the Observation Bunker was destroyed. The 
Armada is a large vessle, loaded with warheads to eradicate all intelligent 
life. When the bunker was destroyed, it began its mission to destroy the 
transformers.
    The Bunker was destroyed when the Carbon Dioxide filter shut down and 
allowed Oxygen to flood into the bunker, which the aliens could not breath. 
From what the arachnid determined, they had been dead for a week, leaveing 
them with a few days to stop the vessle.
    "Aracnia! We have troble! These Aliens, it seems, figured out that we 
would get to them sooner or later. A warship is headed this way, programmed 
to eradicate any intelligent life. Our metal bodys and sparks will be dead 
give aways." Tarantulas said to Aracnia.
    She turned to him. "Damn it! When will it arrive?" She yelled.
    "Four days, and then according to the data, it will begin an automated 
assult via warheads."
    She paused for a moment. She knew only oner person who could aid them in 
a situation like this. "Alright, get Megatron on the Comm, we need to talk. 
Now!"
